data.title: Monotch wins Automotive Innovation Award 2019
data.meta_description: The Automotive Innovation Award 2019 winners were announced yesterday evening. Monotch is proud to win in the category of Services!
data.text:
An ode to Dutch mobility innovations

The biennial Automotive Innovation Award symbolises the innovative capacity of the Dutch automotive industry. The large number of participants are all of international stature. Even though the Netherlands is not a major car production country, our innovations make a significant difference. This recognition underlines the importance of innovation for a smarter, safer and more sustainable future of mobility.

TLEX: innovation in data exchange

In the Services category, focused on innovations in sharing and service platforms, data collection and management, Monotch stood out with the TLEX product. This platform facilitates real-time, bi-directional data exchange between roadside equipment and road users, a first of its kind.

A mobility vision that reaches further

Menno Malta, CEO of Monotch, said: “This is a great encouragement. Our dream is to connect road users and roadside equipment. This mission requires patience as the roadside equipment is gradually made smart, but we expect the results in the Netherlands within three years. You can be assured that our ambition goes further than the Dutch border. In any case, this award is an important step for our future.”

Recognition and ambitions of Monotch

The jury praised Monotch for designing a platform with enormous potential. This is an opportunity to improve traffic flow and contribute to safer traffic. TLEX’s impact on traffic in the Netherlands and Europe was considered tremendous.
